title: Ankum
author: Ankum
content: Cryptocurrency price on April 13 quick take: The global market cap rose to $1.23 trillion.Bitcoin price stood at $30,086.21 on Thursday.Following a day of slump, Bitcoin (BTC), the oldest and most valued cryptocurrency, managed to rise above the $30,000 mark yet again. Additionally, after the much-awaited Ethereum Shanghai Upgrade, ETH managed to rise above the $1,900 mark once again. Other popular altcoins — including the likes of Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), and Solana (SOL) — landed in the greens across the board. The WOO Network (WOO) token managed to become the biggest gainer of the lot, with a 24-hour jump of over 11 percent. https://news.abplive.com/business/crypto/cryptocurrency-price-today-in-india-april-13-check-global-market-cap-bitcoin-btc-ethereum-shanghai-upgrade-doge-solana-litecoin-ripple-xrp-dogecoin-woo-network-gainer-loser-1595191The global crypto market cap stood at $1.23 trillion at the time of writing, registering a 24-hour gain of 1.20 percent.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Yes I am getting 2021 vibes about. Seeing Ethereum go up $100 in a manner of minutes it’s just crazy. Don’t think this is a stop hunt since the funding rate wasn’t even that high. In a few days we might find out some large player like Elon bought some ETH.Normally when it breaks this hard it usually goes back down but it stayed up so far. And when is the last time we had a 5% candle in a 5M time frame. Seems the bull is back.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: I think, this is a sign that bullish season is about to take place this week because the price of Bitcoin has hit $30,671 few hours ago to alert long term traders that the time to sell to achieve something good is very close. It was a great celebration in the community, when the price of Ethereum increased to $2000 yesterday because many traders have been waiting for the price to increase higher so that they can start releasing their altcoins to make a good profits. Now that Bitcoin price has affected other cryptocurrencies price positively, I think the price of cryptocurrency and Bitcoin will increase higher before the end of this week to allow traders to experience steady bullish market.
